page.title: 10A day of my life
page.content: My name is Leanne and I am ten years old. I get up at 07.00 and have breakfast of cereal, toast and a cup of tea at 07.30. My Mum and Dad then drive me to their place of work, where I wait until it's time to walk over to my School which is nearby. I get to School at 08.40, meet my friends and have a little chat. At 09.00 the whistle is blown and we go into school to be registered. This is followed by an assembly in the hall of all the children. We have a story, a hymn and prayers. Back in the classroom we do work in Mathematics and Language. There is a break at 10.45 and stop for dinner at 12 noon. Afternoon school starts at 13.15 and ends at 15.30. I watch some television in the evening after learning my spellings and tables. I put my cat in its box before I go to bed at 21.00.
